socials.name: botar
socials.ACT_ACTTARG: You bounce your head like a basketball.
socials.PER_NOTARG: $n bounces around with a happy smile.
socials.PER_ACTTARG: You bounce your head like a basketball.
socials.ACTOR: You bounce onto $S lap and wiggle about.
socials.TARGET: $n bounces onto your lap and wiggles about.
socials.PEERS: $n bounces onto $N's lap and wiggles about.

socials.name: waggle
socials.ACT_NOTARG: You waggle your eyebrows as only a minotaur can.
socials.PER_NOTARG: $n waggles $s eyebrows as only a minotaur can.

socials.name: strut
socials.ACT_NOTARG: You strut like the kind of man you are.
socials.PER_NOTARG: $n struts in a very manly manner.
